name: International Mobile Recharge
description: Nymgo Plus is a new app from Nymgo that allows you to easily and conveniently recharge and do air time top ups for the prepaid mobile phones of your family and friends when you are in a different country, at amazingly low prices!  You can create an account for free or if you have an existing Nymgo account (username/password), you can now simply login to Nymgo Plus on Android, select an international mobile phone number, pick the recharge or topup amount, confirm payment and boom youre done!  Our mission has always been to help the diaspora communities around the world connect with their loved ones.  We currently support more than 350 operators in more than 124 countries, with more to come.  As always our customer service team is ready 24/7 to help you out, just drop a note to support@nymgo.com
